Text: Can anyone please seeeed!!!!!!!! I am waiting for it

Hey Thingy!  thanks for all the awesome programs you make available to us poor people ;)  
I am having an issue with Captivate 5... it installs fine but the when I open the program it just hangs on the loading window... i have installed 5 times and still can figure it out... any idea what I can do to fix it?  Many thx

@bill1111: Try clicking on the loading screen and give it a while (10 minutes), and it should load up. I had this issue with Illustrator.

@thethingy: Works great as all of your torrents seem to work great and NO VIRUS'.
Hi .. I was wondering if you have any dvd training on Captivate 5..or maybe know where I can download.
What he said above. Lynda Captivate 5 Essential Training, please. Or any other. Thanks.

Just completed the download and installed.
As usual no glitch just smooth installation including the text to speech.
Thanks Thingy a Thousand Times.

:) The training dvd is on the way down....

Hi TheThingy

Can you please give us Captivate 5 for MAC?

I installed this fantastic program on my last computer (64 bit) tried to install in on my new computer (32 bit) and I get an error message when it first starts to install saying Installer failed to initialize. Plese download support advisor to detect the problem.

I went to the other link and downloaded and followed the Clean install.  I still got the same error message.

Any suggestions?

Hiya Thingy,

Hi thethingy, iam running windows 7 and after installation it just sits at the loading screen, any ideas? Thanks for everything else, they work great !!!
i must be blind or stupid or just plain overlooking something here but, serials, etc? all i got was the program itself but nothing else, no read mes or anything of the like

oh and by the way, thethingy....... youre frikken awesome. i dont know who you are or where you came from but i do know that you single handedly improved the quality of my life. i'm hoping youre a ridiculously hot brunette female because liking you as much as i do is going to otherwise jeopardize everything i think i know about myself.
